repairedDockerfile:
FROM mapcentia/gc2core:base
MAINTAINER Martin HÃ¸gh<mh@mapcentia.com>

RUN export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

# Install ECW 3.3
RUN wget https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/mapcentia-www/software/libecwj2-3.3-2006-09-06.zip &&\
	unzip libecwj2-3.3-2006-09-06.zip && \
	wget https://trac.osgeo.org/gdal/raw-attachment/ticket/3162/libecwj2-3.3-msvc90-fixes.patch && \
	patch -p0< libecwj2-3.3-msvc90-fixes.patch && \
	wget https://osgeo-org.1560.x6.nabble.com/attachment/5001530/0/libecwj2-3.3-wcharfix.patch && \
	wget https://trac.osgeo.org/gdal/raw-attachment/ticket/3366/libecwj2-3.3-NCSPhysicalMemorySize-Linux.patch && \
	cd libecwj2-3.3/ && \
	patch -p0< ../libecwj2-3.3-NCSPhysicalMemorySize-Linux.patch && \
	patch -p1< ../libecwj2-3.3-wcharfix.patch && \
	./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" && \
	make && \
	make install
